basis: User explicitly states delaying eating after the 15-minute pause and logs urges without taking a snack; no evidence of actual eating action.
cognitive_dissonance: No strong internal conflict expressed; user remains aligned with delaying yet notes tension, suggesting mild tension without overt regression.
negative_thought_patterns: Possible all-or-nothing or rigid adherence to 'ultra-simple' steps; occasional framing of days as tense to justify limited action.
emotional_triggers: Tension or stress on the day appears to increase urge to delay or avoid more intensive strategies; environment remains focused on pauses and grounding.
coaching_notes: Maintain a calm, supportive tone and validate progress. Continue ultra-simple micro-steps, but begin layering in optional mild variations (e.g., very short hunger-inventory or brief breath work) for tense days to gradually build tolerance for longer waits.
